Text:
I was downloading it with no problems, it said it was going to take a bit over 1 hour... until it reached 88% and now it says it will take like 3 weeks...

WTF!!!
I'll put up UTW's version once they are up.
@delincuentt, maybe it's your internet? I'm still seeding at my end.
VLC player says it's undefined, how do I watch this?

@cristeal

VLC should have no problem playing the file. It's large so might take a while to open.

@Dyingatheist

I must apologize for my coment yesterday, for some reason that I still dont understand my download speed for the las 12%-10% went to nearly nothing, but today i was able to download it all in less than 2 hours (all the way from the beggining).

Everything works fine, subtitles are fine (except for the short video part).

Thank you very much!

Download Complete!

Despues de una larga espera de 2 Semanas, la descarga esta completa.

Muchas felicidades, el video conserva una exelente calidad. Contiene 2 Pistas de Audio Japones, (5.1 & 2.0). Como información adicional están añadidos los Subtitulos en Japonés.

El único defecto que le puedo encontrar, es que La película tiene una velocidad de 24.00 fps.

Lo ideal es 23.97 fps o tambien 29.97 fps

De todas maneras, esta es una Gran Película.
